name: seo_optimizer
description: Analyze and optimize content for SEO. Params: {topic, current_content}

nodes.instruction:
Research top SEO keywords and search intent for: {topic}

Find:
- Primary keywords (volume, difficulty)
- Long-tail variations
- Related questions
- Competitor gaps

Analyze current content for SEO:

Content:
{current_content}

Keywords:
{research_keywords}

Provide:
- Keyword density
- Missing keywords
- Readability score
- Structure issues
- Meta optimization

Rewrite content applying SEO recommendations:

Original:
{current_content}

Optimizations:
{analyze_content}

Maintain:
- Original tone
- Factual accuracy
- Natural flow

Add:
- Optimized title (H1)
- Meta description (155 chars)
- H2/H3 structure
- Internal linking suggestions
